rooms.name: Courtyard
rooms.description: You wake up in a luscious green courtyard full of plants and animals. Past the bushes, you can see what appears to be a small cave entrance surrounded by strange fog and gloom. An assortment of weapons are laid out ahead of you, so choose wisely. (Axe, Shortsword, Longsword, Mace, Spear)

rooms.name: Level 1 Entrance
rooms.description: You travel through the cave to find yourself in a near pitch-black room. A metal housing holds a to the side of the wall. You might want to take that.

rooms.name: Level 1 Entrance Door
rooms.description: You enter to be met with a door twice your height. Who knows what lies beyond it?

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The destroyed remnants of what used to be an incredible kitchen. Full of drawers and cabinets to look through.

rooms.name: Level 1 Courtyard
rooms.description: A small field of green grass. A farming scythe is lodged in the ground in the middle of the room.

rooms.name: Inner Hall
rooms.description: A set of long winding hallways. How long does it go on for?

rooms.name: Music Room
rooms.description: A large room filled with seats, instruments and music stands. Unlike the rest of the dungeon, every inch of the room is kept in pristine condition. A bald man sits behind a desk at the front of the room. A nameplate sits on his desk, reading 'Mr. Bellissimo'

rooms.name: Blood Pit
rooms.description: A massive chasm flooded by the smell of blood and rot. You can make out a sword in the distance, lodged in the ground. It becomes harder to breathe with each step you take towards it. A dead body lies in front of you, having carved a message before dying. It reads 'THE LEGENDARY MIASMA LIES AHEAD, TAME IT OR DIE TRYING.'

rooms.name: Prison
rooms.description: A murky underground cell block guarded by powerful guards. A toolbox sits in the corner of the room, labeled 'TORTURE DEVICES'

rooms.name: Boss Room
rooms.description: A dark room full of tall columns. Strange artworks and writing is engraved in each wall. A tall, mangled creature sits upon a throne in the center of the arena. Before you even take a breath, it stands up and starts running towards you, blade in hand. It is time to face the king of the dungeon. There's also an egg next to the door but you probably have bigger concerns at the moment.

rooms.name: Basement
rooms.description: You enter to find yourself in a dark and dirty basement full of random garbage.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A grand library full of books from wall to wall. There's a lantern strung up against the wall within arm's reach. Who knows how many years worth of information is stored within here?

rooms.name: Backyard
rooms.description: A damaged garden ravaged by monsters, a fraction of its former beauty. A picnic basket sits on the ground in the middle of the field. There's a small hole in the wall.

rooms.name: Hidden Backyard
rooms.description: You crawl through the cave to find a hidden staircase, making way to a small garden full of vibrant plant life. A detailed statue of a warrior stands in the center for all to see. The statue holds a fine blade that looks like it could be pried from its hand.

rooms.name: Level 1 Stairway
rooms.description: A dark and murky staircase. Who knows where it leads to?

rooms.name: Closet
rooms.description: A closet full of extravagant items and clothes.

rooms.name: Locked Room
rooms.description: An dark room full of lockers and random objects.
